quotes.text:
Mathematics is the language with which God has written the universe.

La matematica è la lingua con cui Dio ha scritto l'Universo.
We marveled at our own magnificence as we gave birth to AI.
I propose to consider the question, 'Can machines think?'

To create is to live twice.

Créer, c'est vivre deux fois.
Everything you can imagine is real.
I am sorry to have made such a long speech, but I did not have time to write a shorter one.
Educate the children and it won't be necessary to punish the men.
We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act but a habit.
Educating the mind without educating the heart is not education at all.
None are more hopelessly enslaved than those who falsely believe they are free.
None are more hopelessly enslaved than those who falsely believe they are free.

This is the highest wisdom that I own; freedom and life are earned by those alone who conquer them each day anew.

Das ist der Weisheit letzter Schluß: Der verdient sich Freiheit wie das Leben, Der täglich sie erobern muß.

It is not enough to take steps, which may someday lead to a goal; each step must be itself a goal and a step likewise.

Es soll nicht genügen, dass man Schritte tue, die einst zum Ziele führen, sondern jeder Schritt soll Ziel sein und als Schritt gelten.

We know accurately only when we know little; with knowledge, doubt increases.

Eigentlich weiß man nur, wenn man wenig weiß, mit dem Wissen wächst der Zweifel.
